<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The splitter methods in python_splitters.py return a dataframe that includes the split_index column. E.g. train, validation, test = python_random_split(data, [0.7, 0.15, 0.15]) train, validation, test will have a column called split_index. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
Return dataframe without split_index.
